name: "The Catch"
description: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

passiveDescription.3: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>28%</cryo> and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by <cryo>10.5%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by <cryo>32%</cryo> and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by <cryo>12%</cryo>.
